txt.en: 'I sense that this attack will come soon now, [placeholder]. Are you ready to stand with us and fight? It will be an honour to draw my sword with you.\n\n'We must rouse Wynmar at once from his daze.'
'Wynmar...will be missed. The Elves bore his body away, and the woman Noriel stayed with him to the last. When they carried him off to his burial site -- well, I do not know how to describe it.'

'Are you ready to begin the defence? I do not think we can make it without your aid, with Wynmar in this state....'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is intended to be a single-player encounter, but up to two players may enter at a time. It is recommended that guests do not join if they have not reached this part of the story.</rgb>
There is nothing left to do but to brace for the impending Orc-onslaught and hope that you and the Rohirrim make it through the battle....
The Orc-attack will be soon now.\n\nYou should speak with Rothulf once more to begin the defence of Wynmar's small camp.
Rothulf is at the hunter's camp in the south of Thinglad, making ready to leave for Stangard.\n\nYou should speak with Rothulf.
